descriptionHtml:
Ok so first off I have been moding for myself for many years now, but this is the first mod I have uploded. I just felt it was time to start sharing! :) But enough about me.

I wanted to make a large Holy Sword, and that\'s what this is. Right now it is one handed, but in time I think I may add a two handed version.

Its in Sky Haven Temple next to Dragonsbane 

Anyway I hope you guys like it!

Special Thanks to:

Bethesda: For making an amazing game, and making it so easy to mod it!

The Nexus: For giving all us moders a place to share our mods, and our ideas!

Kalten1979: For making an awesome mod, and letting me use part of it! Thanks man!
author: Kimnokmar
